name: jobs-discuss
unsub: Send an empty email to mailto: jobs-discuss-unsubscribe@perl.org
summary: This is a public list to discuss the Perl employment market. It is also meant to discuss the Perl jobs list. It is not moderated.
sub: Send an empty email to mailto: jobs-discuss-subscribe@perl.org
help: send an empty email to mailto: jobs-discuss-help@perl.org
